if ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_VARIANT}"  STREQUAL "OPENGL")
  if ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_MAJOR}"  GREATER 3)
    set(PROTEAN3D_GL_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glloadgen/GL_4_2 CACHE INTERNAL "OpenGL interface files" FORCE)
  else()
    set(PROTEAN3D_GL_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glloadgen/GL_3_3 CACHE INTERNAL "OpenGL interface files" FORCE)  
  endif()
  FILE(GLOB PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES ${PROTEAN3D_GL_DIR}/*.c)    
  set (PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES ${PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
elseif ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_VARIANT}"  STREQUAL "OPENGL_ES")
  # ES sources  
endif()
